main event: A rapidly maneuvered object, like an energy wheel, was observed in Georgetown, Massachusetts on July 5, 1955.
interesting points: The object traveled a circular flight path from east to north at an extremely fast rate of speed,The object was estimated to be approximately 230 ft in diameter,The sighting lasted for 6-8 seconds,The investigator speculated that it could be a high flying jet aircraft or have an astronomical explanation,There were discussions on the possibility of it being a balloon or aircraft based on further investigation.
